name: obsidian-roguelike
description: Gamified goal tracking with XP, levels, achievements, and loot. Turn your tasks into an RPG adventure!

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.install-vault: npm run build && mkdir -p "$VAULT_PATH/.obsidian/plugins/roguelike" && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css "$VAULT_PATH/.obsidian/plugins/roguelike/"
